info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 13 at 9:33AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...BAND OF MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW DROPPING SOUTH... At 925 AM EST...A band of moderate to heavy snow extended from near Stevensville to Sodus to just west of Dowagiac. Brief snowfall rates to 2 inches per hour will accompany this band as it drops south leading to significantly reduced visibilities and deteriorating travel conditions due to slick and snow covered roads. The band is moving to the southeast at around 10 mph and will affect the Bridgman, Baroda, Eau Claire, Berrien Springs, Indian Lake, Magician Lake, and Dowagiac areas through 1130 AM EST this morning. Motorists should be alert for rapidly changing conditions as this band slowly drops southward through late morning.
